mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reactionPoint WHERE relTypeCode = 'article' AND relId =${articleId} AND `point` = ${type}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reactionPoint WHERE relTypeCode = 'article' AND relId =#{id} AND memberId = #{memberId}
INSERT INTO reactionPoint SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), memberId = #{memberId}, relTypeCode = 'article', relId = #{articleId}, point = #{type}

UPDATE article AS A INNER JOIN ( SELECT RP.relTypeCode, RP.relId, SUM(IF(RP.point > 0, RP.point, 0)) AS goodReactionPoint, SUM(IF(RP.point < 0, RP.point * -1, 0)) AS badReactionPoint FROM reactionPoint AS RP GROUP BY RP.relTypeCode, RP.relId ) AS RP_SUM ON A.id = RP_SUM.relId SET A.goodReactionPoint = RP_SUM.goodReactionPoint, A.badReactionPoint = RP_SUM.badReactionPoint;
